metadata.title: CVE-2023-38407 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
bgpd/bgp_label.c in FRRouting (FRR) before 8.5 attempts to read beyond theend of the stream during labeled unicast parsing.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-38407` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

frr - 8.1-1ubuntu1.8
frr-pythontools - 8.1-1ubuntu1.8
frr-rpki-rtrlib - 8.1-1ubuntu1.8
frr-snmp - 8.1-1ubuntu1.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: frr package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8.1-1ubuntu1.8').
